title: About This Blog
text:
You might know me from my work on Grinding The Mocks, my side project that uses mock drafts, the wisdom of crowds, and data science to predict the NFL Draft. I’ve been fortunate to work with NFL teams, agents, and football analytics companies as a data provider and to have my work featured in FiveThirtyEight, The New York Times, and Football Outsiders.
But there’s more to me than just sports analytics! In my personal life, I’m passionate about:

being Jewish (✡️and proud of it!)
being the best uncle to my nephew (❤️you Judah!)
eating and making bagels (🥯of all kinds!)
playing guitar (electric and acoustic 🎸!)
and exploring cities (on 🦶,🚋, 🚌, and in💻!)
